availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James S. Harding (Brown County, Ohio, stone mason)

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, stone mason. Virginia native. Married to Lavinia Frazier Harding in Brown County on November 24, 1835. Father of Alvira Hardin, Mary Hardin, Hester Hardin, Catherine Hardin, George W. Harding, Isabella Harding, Elizabeth Harding, Laura Harding. Stone mason in Brown County in 1850. Stone mason in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Brown County, District No. 12 Byrd Township, p. 117.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Brown County, Ripley, p. 421.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Union Township, p. 76.
Ohio, County Marriage Records (1744-1993), Various Ohio County Courthouses, Brown County Marriages, Film #000384273, p. 15.
